title: Today's Brief - February 22, 2026
description: OpenAI slashes its ambitious spending target from $1.4 trillion to $600 billion by 2030 while cybersecurity stocks crash 8-9% as Anthropic's new AI security tool sparks fears that artificial intelligence will make traditional cybersecurity companies obsolete. Plus: the Supreme Court strikes down global tariffs, Amazon's AI causes major AWS outages, and why ChatGPT users are shifting from work tasks to personal ones.
